backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing ranks-page implementation, routing updates, and related components with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their roles in the copper-themed site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color tokens and dark mode values using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes, including the new RanksPage, within the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page wrapper providing navigation, main content outlet, and themed footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with active-route highlighting and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a copper-themed light and dark design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Intentionally empty component used for placeholder routes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Hero-style homepage with copper-themed branding, navigation buttons, and feature cards linking to lore, history, ranks, and divisions.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Ranks page rendering detailed hierarchy sections with styled cards, icons, and structured lists for leadership and other rank groups.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining copper-themed colors, typography, animations, and extended utilities with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, implemented features, and state for the copper-themed website including updates to the Ranks page.
